data.lyric:
[ti:White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:100 Essential Christmas Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]White Christmas - Bing Crosby (平克·劳斯)
[00:10.75]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[00:20.22]
[00:22.16]Just like the ones I used to know
[00:27.14]
[00:30.71]Where the treetops glisten
[00:34.94]
[00:36.31]And children listen
[00:40.35]
[00:41.58]To hear sleigh bells in the snow
[00:48.16]
[00:52.06]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[01:01.11]
[01:03.71]With every Christmas card I write
[01:08.66]
[01:11.72]May your days be merry and bright
[01:21.04]
[01:22.87]And may all your Christmases be white
[01:31.30]
[01:34.90]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[01:43.54]
[01:45.69]Just like the ones I used to know
[01:51.18]
[01:53.86]Where the treetops glisten
[01:58.40]
[01:59.56]And children listen
[02:03.32]
[02:04.57]To hear sleigh bells in the snow
[02:12.78]
[02:15.21]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[02:23.53]
[02:25.88]With every Christmas card I write
[02:32.38]
[02:33.98]May your days be merry and bright
[02:43.73]
[02:46.74]And may all your Christmases be white
